BestStorage.title: The best cloud storage Black Friday deal
BestStorage.subtitle: Internxt's discount on privacy and peace of mind will be back next year!

SuiteSection.title: Get more for less: secure cloud storage plans at unbeatable prices!
SuiteSection.subtitle: Take back control of your data with Internxt, get total online privacy, and protect yourself, your business, or your family from cyberattacks and companies profiting from your data.

drive.title: Internxt Drive
drive.subtitle: Upload, store, and share your files in total privacy with our encrypted cloud service. Backup and sync your files to prevent data loss and ensure smooth collaboration.

photos.title: Internxt for Business
photos.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your business securely. Secure file sharing, storage allocation, and session management features ensure that Internxt meets all your business needs.

send.title: Internxt for Families
send.subtitle: Complete peace of mind for your family. Securely store, share, and manage your best memories from one single, encrypted cloud platform.

FeatureSection.title: Why choose Internxt?
FeatureSection.subtitle: We build all our products with privacy in mind. We don’t run our business on data or advertising; we build it on trust. Our encrypted technology protects your files and ensures you keep your fundamental right to privacy.

feature1.title: Unhackable and unleakable data
feature1.subtitle1: We don’t store passwords or user data and all of your data is encrypted in-transit and at-rest. Internxt puts you in full control of your files. Your data is your business. Protecting it is ours.

feature2.title: Uncompromising security
feature2.subtitle1: Your files are end-to-end encrypted before ever leaving your device. Thanks to zero-knowledge AES-256 encryption, you are the absolutely only one with access to your data.

feature3.title: Open source and transparent
feature3.subtitle1: We are proud of what we do, so our code is made public on GitHub and can be personally reviewed, audited, and verified by anyone. We have nothing to hide but your data.

feature4.title: Independently verified
feature4.subtitle1: We’re wholly GDPR compliant and 100% safe, but don’t take our word for it. Internxt has been independently audited and verified by Europe’s leading penetration testing company, Securitum.

PlatformSection.title: Access your files anywhere, anytime
PlatformSection.subtitle: Internxt is available on all platforms, meaning your files are just a click away!

TestimonialsSection.title: What our users are saying about us

cards.name: Eva Williams
cards.review: Internxt is a convenient cloud storage service for privacy-conscious clients. It has a streamlined interface and a reliable support team, which makes it a great option for those who need to store their files securely.

cards.name: Cristian M.
cards.review: The best encrypted Dropbox alternative. Overall: We needed an alternative that allowed us to store client files and work (social media files) and as Internxt is GDPR friendly fit perfectly for us!

cards.name: Josep Carrizo
cards.review: I've been using Google Drive for several years, but I needed an alternative which granted me the privacy of my data. Something that Google or other well known platforms can't do. That's why I moved to Internxt.

faq.question: How can I get the Black Friday discount?
answer: To claim your Black Friday discount, choose your preferred individual, business, or family plan and head to the checkout page. Your 85% discount is automatically applied at the checkout.

faq.question: When does the promotion end?
answer: The Black Friday sale ends December 3rd, 2024.

faq.question: Who is eligible for this discount?
answer: New users or anyone with a free Internxt account is eligible to take part in our Black Friday Sale.

faq.question: Will I keep the discount when my plan ends?
answer: The Black Friday deal is until the end of the subscription period. Your subscription will renew at the regular price once this subscription period ends at the end of the month or year. As lifetime plans only require one payment, your discount will last forever.

faq.question: What payment methods does Internxt accept?
answer: Currently, we accept payments via credit and debit cards (including Mastercard, VISA, American Express, and more), and we also accept Paypal, bankcontact, iDEAL, and SOFORT.

faq.question: Have more questions?
answer: Feel free to reach out to us at [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com) or say hello on social media. We are always delighted to hear from you!

FooterSection.title: Stand with privacy. Choose Internxt!
FooterSection.subtitle: Get a discount on privacy and peace of mind.
FooterSection.subtitle1: Get 60% off one whole year of our largest 2TB plan!
